analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of MyOwnToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#165) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MyOwnToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#171-172) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MyOwnToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#173) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_spender' of MyOwnToken.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#202-203) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_amount' of MyOwnToken.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#182) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_value' of MyOwnToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#194) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_amount' of MyOwnToken.distr (/unique_contracts/0x3052285b4c495afe3fb16967142e864c8f8b6e5f.sol#122) is not in mixedCase
